name: sigstack
description: Will Sigmon's Claude Code stack - iOS development, app tools, media, and orchestration plugins

plugins.name: ios-dev
plugins.description: iOS development toolkit - Swift, SwiftUI, Xcode, CloudKit, SwiftData

plugins.name: app-dev
plugins.description: App development tools - features, audio, sync, ops, preferences

plugins.name: dev-essentials
plugins.description: Cross-project tools including Glif, Resend, and performance utilities

plugins.name: superclaude
plugins.description: Meta-orchestration plugin for spawning agents, analyzing code, troubleshooting

plugins.name: media
plugins.description: Media apps - podcasts, audio, RSS, streaming (Modcaster)

plugins.name: work
plugins.description: Work projects - enterprise apps, databases, dashboards (HTI/Knack)
